mapper.insert: insert into file_upload (location, name, old_name, description, create_time, update_time, project_id) values (#{search.location}, #{search.name}, #{search.oldName}, #{search.description}, now(), now(), 1)
mapper.select:
select file.id, file.location, file.name, file.old_name, file.description, file.create_time, file.update_time, file.project_id from file_upload file where 1=1
AND file.id = #{search.id}
AND file.name like concat('%', #{search.name}, '%')
AND file.old_name like concat('%', #{search.oldName}, '%')
GROUP BY file.id
